summary: This module implements the Deep Graph Infomax (DGI) framework using DGL and PyTorch. It defines components for encoding node features into latent embeddings, a discriminator that scores agreement between global and local representations, and a classifier for downstream tasks. The main model orchestrates these parts to learn unsupervised graph representations via mutual information maximization.
business_intent: Provide a reference implementation for unsupervised graph representation learning that can be leveraged to improve downstream node classification, clustering, or anomaly detection in graph-structured data.
